label: 淡竹
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 56th  . Nara National Museum . 2004
説明文: Black bamboo (Phyllostachys nigra). Originating in China, this strain of bamboo is very strong and fine-grained, and thus often used for the slats of bamboo sutra wrappers and for a variety of musical instruments, including the shō. [笙]
